1) Display the top 3 scores. 

 2) Implementation of a generic division operation. 

 3) Modified launch icon.

1) You must solve as many calculations as possible.

2) You have 3 lives.

3) If you run out of lives, you must enter your name and it will be saved in a database.

4) You also have the option to find your score in a leaderboard if available.
